article_title: Daines, Zinke get support in new MSUB poll

article_metadata.news_keywords: , steve daines, barack obama, mike fellows, ryan zinke, patient protection and affordable care act, josh poulette, mathew mcmullen, craig wilson, amanda curtis, john lewis, center for applied economic research, scott rickard

og.description: Montana Republican candidates show strong leads in U.S. Senate and House races, according to a poll released Friday by Montana State University Billings.
